Name: Stela of Nen-akhu-enty-her-shemesu (?)
Description: Narrow rectangular stela with a rounded top, which has partly broken away. Representations and inscriptions are carved, the representations with no further interior details. The surfaces within the contours have been smoothed. The hieroglyphs are shallowly carved and difficult to read, the inscription is damaged in several places. The decorated surface is surrounded by a simple sunken line; Carved lines were used to separate the columns and the registers.
